entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of light snow. Low minus 28. POP 60%
entry.summary: Clear. Increasing cloudiness after midnight then 60 percent chance of light snow overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 28. Wind chill near minus 33. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Tuesday 24 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of light snow. High minus 18. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of light snow in the morning and early in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 18. Wind chill minus 33 in the morning and minus 25 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Tuesday 24 January 2023
